source.7f34ca11:
def seed_everything(seed=42):
    random.seed(seed)
    os.environ['PYTHONHASHSEED'] = str(seed)
    np.random.seed(seed)
    torch.manual_seed(seed)
    torch.cuda.manual_seed(seed)
    torch.backends.cudnn.deterministic = True

class CONFIG:
    max_length = 300
    num_targets = 1
    SEED = 321
    loader_params = dict(
        trn=dict(batch_size=4,
                 num_workers=0,
                 shuffle=True,
                 pin_memory=True),
        val=dict(batch_size=5,
                 num_workers=0,
                 shuffle=False,
                 pin_memory=True),
        tst=dict(batch_size=5,
                 num_workers=0,
                 shuffle=False,
                 pin_memory=True),
        all=dict(batch_size=5,
                 num_workers=0,
                 shuffle=False,
                 pin_memory=True)
    )
    learning_rate = 5e-5
    n_folds = 5
    
seed_everything(CONFIG.SEED)

root_path = pathlib.Path('../input/commonlitreadabilityprize')

save_path = pathlib.Path('.')
source.52bfe2d9:
results = []
heads = ['AttentionHead', 'CNNHead', 'LSTMHead', 'TransformerHead']
models = [
    'roberta-base',
    'distilbert-base-uncased', 
    'xlnet-base-cased'
]


dir_path = pathlib.Path('../input/commonlitreadabilitymodelsencoders/models')

fold_id = 0
models_dict = defaultdict(lambda: defaultdict(dict))
for model_name in models:
    model_name = model_name
    model_path = dir_path / model_name
    for head in heads:
        model = CommonLitModel(model_name, fold_id, head=head, models_path=dir_path)
        print(model_name, head)
        assert model.is_fine_tuned
        model = model.cuda()
        model.eval()
        lst = [(model(batch['inputs'].cuda(), batch['masks'].cuda()) - batch['targets'].cuda()).pow(2).cpu().detach().numpy().ravel() for batch in model.val_dataloader()]
        score = np.sqrt(np.concatenate(lst).mean())
        models_dict[model_name][head] = model
        print(model_name, head, score)
source.88476491:
all_models = []
for model_name, v in models_dict.items():
    model_outs = []
    for head, model in tqdm(v.items()):
        outs = []
        for batch in model.fetch_dataloader('all'):
            o = model.feature_extractor(batch['inputs'].cuda(), batch['masks'].cuda()).logits
            o = model.head(o).cpu().detach().numpy()
            outs.append(o)
        out = pd.DataFrame(np.concatenate(outs), index=model.data.index)
        out.columns = [f'{model_name}_{head}_{col}' for col in out.columns]
        model_outs.append(out)
    heads = pd.concat(model_outs, axis=1)
    all_models.append(heads)

X = pd.concat(all_models, axis=1)
source.151336c5:
all_models = []
for model_name, v in models_dict.items():
    model_outs = []
    for head, model in tqdm(v.items()):
        outs = []
        for batch in model.fetch_dataloader('tst'):
            o = model.feature_extractor(batch['inputs'].cuda(), batch['masks'].cuda()).logits
            o = model.head(o).cpu().detach().numpy()
            outs.append(o)
        out = pd.DataFrame(np.concatenate(outs), index=model.data.loc[model.masks['tst']].index)
        out.columns = [f'{model_name}_{head}_{col}' for col in out.columns]
        model_outs.append(out)
    heads = pd.concat(model_outs, axis=1)
    all_models.append(heads)

X_tst = pd.concat(all_models, axis=1)
source.e3ad75f1:
trn_idx = model.data[model.masks['trn']].index
val_idx = model.data[model.masks['val']].index
y = pd.read_csv(root_path / "train.csv").set_index('id')['target']
X = X[X.index.isin(y.index)]
x_trn, x_val = X.loc[trn_idx, :], X.loc[val_idx, :]
y_trn, y_val = y.loc[trn_idx], y.loc[val_idx]


model = LGBMRegressor().fit(x_trn, y_trn, eval_set=[(x_trn, y_trn), (x_val, y_val)], early_stopping_rounds=100, verbose=-1)

np.sqrt(metrics.mean_squared_error(y_val, model.predict(x_val)) )
